public class HorizBarChart
extends BarChart
A chart that represents data with horizontally arranged bars

HorizBarChart()
constructs a default chart
HorizBarChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
HorizBarChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class
